parameters.name: api_key (Required)
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: place_id (Optional)
parameters.description: A Flickr Places ID. (While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)

parameters.name: woe_id (Optional)
parameters.description: A Where On Earth (WOE) ID. (While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)

parameters.name: api_key (Required)
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: user_id (Required)
parameters.description: The NSID of the user to fetch information about.

parameters.name: 2: No photo specified
parameters.description: The photo required argument was missing.

parameters.name: 3: General upload failure
parameters.description: The file was not correctly uploaded.

parameters.name: 4: Filesize was zero
parameters.description: The file was zero bytes in length.

parameters.name: 5: Filetype was not recognised
parameters.description: The file was not of a recognised image format.

parameters.name: 6: User exceeded upload limit
parameters.description: The calling user has reached their monthly bandwidth limit.

parameters.name: 95: SSL is required
parameters.description: SSL is required to access the Flickr API.

parameters.name: 96: Invalid signature
parameters.description: The passed signature was invalid.

parameters.name: 97: Missing signature
parameters.description: The call required signing but no signature was sent.

parameters.name: 98: Login failed / Invalid auth token
parameters.description: The login details or auth token passed were invalid.

parameters.name: 99: User not logged in / Insufficient permissions
parameters.description: The method requires user authentication but the user was not logged in, or the authenticated method call did not have the required permissions.

parameters.name: 100: Invalid API Key
parameters.description: The API key passed was not valid or has expired.

parameters.name: 105: Service currently unavailable
parameters.description: The requested service is temporarily unavailable.

parameters.name: 106: Write operation failed
parameters.description: The requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.

parameters.name: 116: Bad URL found
parameters.description: One or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.

parameters.name: api_key (Required)
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: title (Required)
parameters.description: The name of the gallery

parameters.name: description (Required)
parameters.description: A short description for the gallery

parameters.name: primary_photo_id (Optional)
parameters.description: The first photo to add to your gallery

parameters.name: full_result (Optional)
parameters.description: Get the result in the same format as galleries.getList

parameters.name: api_key (Required)
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: group_id (Required)
parameters.description: The NSID or path alias of the group to fetch information for.

parameters.name: per_page (Optional)
parameters.description: Number of photos to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value is 500.

parameters.name: page (Optional)
parameters.description: The page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.

parameters.name: api_key (Required)
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: group_id (Required)
parameters.description: The NSID or path alias of the group to add a topic to.

parameters.name: subject (Required)
parameters.description: The topic subject.

parameters.name: message (Required)
parameters.description: The topic message.

parameters.name: 1: No title specified

parameters.name: 2: Photo not found
parameters.description: The primary photo id passed was not a valid photo id or does not belong to the calling user.

parameters.name: 3: Can't create any more sets
parameters.description: The user has reached their maximum number of photosets limit.

parameters.description: The requested response format was not found.

parameters.name: 114: Invalid SOAP envelope
parameters.description: The SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.

parameters.name: api_key (Required)
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: photo_id (Required)
parameters.description: The id of the photo to get information for.

parameters.name: secret (Optional)
parameters.description: The secret for the photo. If the correct secret is passed then permissions checking is skipped. This enables the 'sharing' of individual photos by passing around the id and secret.

parameters.name: api_key (Required)
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: service (Optional)
parameters.description: Optionally only return blogs for a given service id. You can get a list of from flickr.blogs.getServices() .

parameters.name: api_key (Required)
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: user_id (Required)
parameters.description: The NSID of the user to get a galleries list for. If none is specified, the calling user is assumed.

parameters.name: per_page (Optional)
parameters.description: Number of galleries to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value is 500.

parameters.name: page (Optional)
parameters.description: The page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.

parameters.name: primary_photo_extras (Optional)
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of extra information to fetch for the primary photo. Currently supported fields are: license, date_upload, date_taken, owner_name, icon_server, original_format, last_update, geo, tags, machine_tags, o_dims, views, media, path_alias, url_sq, url_t, url_s, url_m, url_o

parameters.name: api_key (Required)
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: photo_id (Required)
parameters.description: The id of the photo to set location data for.

parameters.name: lat (Required)
parameters.description: The latitude whose valid range is -90 to 90. Anything more than 6 decimal places will be truncated.

parameters.name: lon (Required)
parameters.description: The longitude whose valid range is -180 to 180. Anything more than 6 decimal places will be truncated.

parameters.name: accuracy (Optional)
parameters.description: Recorded accuracy level of the location information. World level is 1, Country is ~3, Region ~6, City ~11, Street ~16. Current range is 1-16. Defaults to 16 if not specified.

parameters.name: context (Optional)
parameters.description:
Context is a numeric value representing the photo's geotagginess beyond latitude and longitude. For example, you may wish to indicate that a photo was taken "indoors" or "outdoors".

The current list of context IDs is :

0 , not defined.
1 , indoors.
2 , outdoors.

The default context for geotagged photos is 0, or "not defined"

parameters.name: api_key (Required)
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: date (Required)
parameters.description: Stats will be returned for this date. This should be in either be in YYYY-MM-DD or unix timestamp format. A day according to Flickr Stats starts at midnight GMT for all users, and timestamps will automatically be rounded down to the start of the day.

parameters.name: domain (Required)
parameters.description: The domain to return referrers for. This should be a hostname (eg: "flickr.com") with no protocol or pathname.

parameters.name: photoset_id (Optional)
parameters.description: The id of the photoset to get stats for. If not provided, stats for all sets will be returned.

parameters.name: per_page (Optional)
parameters.description: Number of referrers to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 25. The maximum allowed value is 100.

parameters.name: page (Optional)
parameters.description: The page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.
